E

Etudiant - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents a student with their name, subjects, coefficients, and grades.
Etudiant(String, String[], double[], int) - Constructor for class Etudiant
Constructs a new Etudiant object with the specified name, subjects, coefficients, and number of grades.

G

getNbMatieres() - Method in class Etudiant
Returns the number of subjects.
getNom() - Method in class Etudiant
Returns the name of the student.
getUneNote(int, int) - Method in class Etudiant
Returns a specific grade for a given subject and grade index.

I

meilleureNote() - Method in class Etudiant

moyenneGenerale() - Method in class Etudiant

moyenneMatiere(int) - Method in class Etudiant

T

toString() - Method in class Etudiant
